Jan. 31, 2015 D Wessex Youth & Training Band Contest
Wessex Youth & Training Band Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
wessex-youth-training-band-contest
None
Trafalgar School, Downton, Wiltshire 1st Place in the Youth Section winning the "Royal Marines Cup" - Verwood Youth "The Tony Hickson Memorial Trophy" for the Best Bass Section in the Youth Section - Bridge Brass
1st Place in the Training Section winning the “Hawkes Challenge Trophy” - Andover Training 2nd Place in the Training Section winning the "Grading Cup" - Vectis Training
1st Place in the Ensemble Class (A) winning the “Wessex Summer Cup” - Hyde Training 1st Place in the Ensemble Class (B) winning the “Trevada Cup” - Vectis (A)
Gold Awards: Andover Training – Principal Cornet
Silver Awards: Gillingham Imperial Training Hyde Training – Tenor Horn Vectis (B) - Euphonium
Bronze Awards New Forest Training Hyde Training Quartet Vectis (B) – Trombone
Francis Cowley Voucher” and the “Bowditch Trophy” to the youngest Instrumentalist in either sections. - Oliver Bartlett – Hyde Training (5 Years) “Worsdale Trophy” for the best performance of a hymn tune from either sections - Andover Training “Hawkes Cup” for the best deportment in either sections - Wilton & Distict Training “Angela Lowe Memorial Trophy” to the best instrumentalist in either sections - Adam Large – Andover Training “The Woodfalls Trophy” to the Best Soloist in any section - Emma Groves – Verwood Youth “The Leighton Rich Hampshire Youth Cup” for the best overall band in either sections - Andover Training
